changeSet.author: Leap (generated)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO usm_constant (item,project_name,item_value,project_id) SELECT 'kg.stableNodesThreshold','Core','2000',a.id FROM usm_project a WHERE name='Core';

changeSet.author: Leap
Leap
Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE usm_users SET client_details=JSON_SET( JSON_SET(client_details,'$[0].pointer',JSON_EXTRACT(client_details, '$[0].key')), '$[0].key', NULL ) WHERE client_details IS NOT NULL AND JSON_EXTRACT(client_details, '$[0].key') IS NOT NULL

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE usm_users SET client_details = JSON_REMOVE(client_details, '$[0].key') WHERE client_details IS NOT NULL
